text: "Hooked on a Feeling" is a 1968 song by B. J. Thomas. It was taken from his 1968 studio album On My Way. It went to number 5 in the United States, number 10 in New Zealand, number 3 in Canada and number 35 in Australia. It was later covered by Blue Swede in 1973, Vonda Shepard in 1998 and Carroll Baker. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Pop songs Category:B. J. Thomas songs Category:Carroll Baker songs
title: Hooked on a Feeling
